General.Name: Emova Group SA
General.Description: Emova Group SA operates as a retail flower distribution company. It operates a network of own shops and franchise stores under the Monceau Fleurs, Coeur de Fleurs, and Au Nom de la Rose brands primarily in France. The company also offers decorative plants. The company was formerly known as Groupe Monceau Fleurs S.A. and changed its name to Emova Group SA in April 2015. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Issy-Les-Moulineaux, France.
General.Address: 233 - 235 Avenue du Jour Raises, Boulogne Billancourt, France, 92100
